verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prastutamandu unnavi yainan raabovu Nattivi yainanu vaastavamugaa Samastamu meeve Meeresuni vaaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thannu preminchuchundedi Vaariki devudu vetini stiraparacheno Kannulaku gocharamu kaavavi Chevulaku vinabadavu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hrudayamulaku agocharamulavi Marugai yunde lokajnaanulaku Padilamugaa prabhu sahaayamutho Nerugu mee marmamunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Akshaya mainadi nirmalamainadi Vaada baaranidi mee swaastyamu Rakshakudesu bhadraparachenu Paramuna meekoraku{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Asamaanamagu shakhtiche mimmun Nityamu kaachi bhadraparachunu Yesu aa kadavary rakshana Meeku nitchu viswasinchu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Meere devuni putrulatanchu Aatmaye saakshyamitchchu Chunnaadu vaarasulagu meeru shrama Padina mahimanu pondedaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jayinchu vaadu veetannitini Swatantrinchu konu nikkamugaa Aayane meeku devudai yundu Meeraayana sutulu{/lang-eng}
